comments.text:
They all attended BYU at one point and were in BYU's sketch comedy group, 
Divine Comedy. They started Studio C with members of that group, and now 
that they're all graduated (except Stacey), they can keep doing comedy 
through Studio C even though they can't be in Divine Comedy anymore.

I don't know if that made sense but I tried.

captions.text: I THOUGHT YOU TWO WERE BACK TOGETHER.
I REALLY SHOULD SPEND MORE TIME GOSSIPING
>>IT'S TOO HARD BETWEEN ME AND RACHEL.
IS TRYING TO TEAR US APART.
>>COME ON RYAN, YOU TWO WERE MEANT TO BE!
RYAN AND RACHEL, WILL THEY OR WON'T THEY?
YOU EVEN HAVE A COUPLE NAME.
HE MUST NOT HAVE REALIZED THAT WE'RE COUSINS.
>>AND THAT WE HAVEN'T DATED FOR YEARS!
I HAVE TO TALK TO HIM.
>>IT'S NOT WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE I SWEAR!
>>WHY DO YOU HAVE TO BE HOLDING ME LIKE THAT WHEN
>>YOU THOUGHT YOU COULD GET AWAY WITH GRAND  THEFT,
WELL YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO REMAIN SILENT.
>>I DON'T EVEN KNOW WHO YOU ARE ANY MORE
IT'S NOT WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE.
>>THANKS A LOT OF LETTING ME PRACTICE ON YOU RANDOM STUDENT!
>>OH YOU KNOW, FIRST DAY ON THE JOB.
I STILL GOT TO PRACTICE WITH THE PEPPER SPRAY!
>>YOU HAVE A FAMILY YOU NEVER TOLD ME ABOUT?
>>RACHEL IT'S NOT WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE!
>>THAT CHILD HAS YOUR DECEITFUL BEADY EYES RYAN.
>>I WORK FOR A STOCK PHOTO COMPANY.
IT'S NOT WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE.
>>I DON'T EVEN KNOW WHAT THIS LOOKS LIKE.
SURVEILLANCE CAMERAS LONG ENOUGH FOR YOU TO FREE ALL OF
THE TEST SUBJECT ANIMALS WITHOUT CAMPUS SECURITY NOTICING.
I KIND OF ASSUMED YOU WERE GOING TO GO.
>>NO I ACTUALLY KIND OF WANT TO STAY AND SEE
>>OK WELL, THIS ISN'T WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE.
I PRO- YOU KNOW WHAT, I CAN'T.
THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE!
